1a1(yum): yum chen mo bzhugs so//
1b1(yum): // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong bra brgyu ba drug
1b2(yum): zlums pa/ ba dz+nyA chag// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems pa
1b3(yum): sems dpa' chen po de shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
1b4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams nAng stong pa zhes bya bar
1b5(yum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
1b6(yum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe//
2a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bu ba med pa
2a2(yum): sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid
2a3(yum): kyang dmigs la/ snod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rob kyi pha rol
2a4(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
2a5(yum): bai sa 'i khams byi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byo nang
2a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shosar
2b1(yum): pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ci dadang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med papa sa khams song babyung stong
2b2(yum): zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
2b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams chen po spyong pa nyid
2b4(yum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po sdod pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
2b5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams don dam pa song pa zhes
2b6(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyis pa
2b7(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams 'dus byas stod pa zhes bya bar
2b8(yum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
3a1(yum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong ba
3a2(yum): zhes bya byar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol dbyin
3a3(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//
3a4(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' yas las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phral spyod/
3a5(yum): ba'i tshe/ de ge slarab kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid 'a byung med par/ sa khams zlog ma dang tha ma med pa sang zhes bya ba me
3a6(yum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha na med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3a7(yum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnams parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med bar/ sa'i khams dang med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/
3a8(yum): nga med pa gang nga kya dngagasas/ l+r-ing kyi sa sems ni/ nas rab kyi rnam byen de'i byung po tsho/ rnam pa
3b1(yum): rgyu da dang gyung na drus bya brnyed dang/ sa'i 'dus rang nan stong ba zhes bya ba mad byung // dumigs gyum bye 'dra ba slong /
3b2(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathos cad mkhyen pa'ing dang ldan pa
3b3(yum): yid la bya ba med par/ sa ri las chos thams cad stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs le/ stong
3b4(yum): pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do// pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
3b5(yum): sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyir dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
3b6(yum): kyis rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
3b7(yum): sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
3b8(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de nas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
4a1(yum): med par sa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa nyid kyang
4a2(yum): dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ya
4a3(yum): la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi so ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
4a4(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams la
4a5(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
4a6(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab byung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
4a7(yum): pathams cad mkhyen pa 'i dang ldan pA'i yang bya byang med par/ chu'i khams nang mang+ra zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa med pa'i rdul rgyas nangs
4a8(yum): pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidas
4b1(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chu'i khams byesang pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya spyod pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa la/ sbyong bdas/
4b2(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la bya med pa
4b3(yum): chu'i khams phyi nang stod po zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
4b4(yum): byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid ste
4b5(yum): po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
4b6(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
4b7(yum): dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
4b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam
5a1(yum): pastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
5a2(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bru ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bye bar ying la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis snang ba shing kyang ga
5a3(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
5a4(yum): chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
5a5(yum): byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byung med par/ chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa sno/
5a6(yum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis
5a7(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhi dang ldan pa'i med la bya ba med par/ rdu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa srid pa zhis bya bar yangs byon
5a8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang bram med pa spong ba nyid kyang dmigs ma/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skye/
5b1(yum): bam/ rnam ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang ldan pa'i mengs bya bar med par/ chu'i khams dang med pa skyong ba zhes bya bar yang byed de/ dmigs dang chus /
5b2(yum): ba med pa spong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa tsho/ rnam thams cang mkhyen pa ni
5b3(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa'i
5b4(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams
5b5(yum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
5b6(yum): do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong
5b7(yum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
5b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la
6a1(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes rab kyi ro//
6a2(yum): du phyin pa la spyod pa \u0f7f/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rjid dang ldan pa'i yid la byung med dang/ chu'i khams dngos po meng bar ming la stong pa zhes bya bar yid
6a3(yum): byed de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
6a4(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
6a5(yum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
6a6(yum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu
6a7(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang so rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
6a8(yum): sems dpa' chen 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad ma phyin pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mi ma khams
6b1(yum): nad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su zud // /
6b2(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams phyi stong po nis bu
6b3(yum): yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
6b4(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi
6b5(yum): po'i tshul gyis byi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
6b6(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
6b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
6b8(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chen po stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
7a1(yum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
7a2(yum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams don dam par song nga zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pasod
7a3(yum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
7a4(yum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas song
7a5(yum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
7a6(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed par/ me'i khams 'dus smras stong ba zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kya
7a7(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
7a8(yum): dang ldan pa'i 'di la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthal pa
7b1(yum): 'das slong tha~Md kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed // de shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma rnam pa
7b2(yum): nad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams thog ma dang tha med pa song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
7b3(yum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor
7b4(yum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs
7b5(yum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
7b6(yum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmig
7b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
7b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ me'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
8a1(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
8a2(yum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams nad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
8a3(yum): pa'i tshul rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
8a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma
8a5(yum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
8a6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang du ldan pa'i yings byang med par/ me khams dngos po med bsong pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas
8a7(yum): dngos po med pa smong pa nyid kyang dadamigs la/ sringo nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ma
8a8(yum): bdang ldan pa'i ming khya med papa ches 'ams tsha gang ces byab med 'byed // dmig sa pa'i chu phyi ba sring pa cing bang mas /
8b1(yum): sa kyang rnam rnams su byed do// deshes rab ba la du ldan pa la skyed pa'i ma/ rnam parnamasasangs rkyen pa da ldan pa'i skyed bya ba nga rgyu
8b2(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i nga bro nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa'i
8b3(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da
8b4(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams nang spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
8b5(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi
8b6(yum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
8b7(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
8b8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
9a1(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
9a2(yum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang / dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
9a3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
9a4(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dang ldan pa'i yid la
9a5(yum): bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams don dam pa stong bzhing zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa'i
9a6(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
9a7(yum): rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong banyid kyang dmigs le/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom
9a8(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ril tu phyin pa la spyong ba'iche/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pacid dang ldan pa'i me la byang med pam rlung gi kham
9b1(yum): 'dus ma byas sang pa zhes bya bar med la byung / dmigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus ma byas spyod pa nyid kyang duzhugs pa/ myong ba dang sa tshum
9b2(yum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa rnams cang ma byon pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/ rlung ga 'ams
9b3(yum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
9b4(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi 'am/
9b5(yum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang
9b6(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi
9b7(yum): khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs su pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms
9b8(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung
10a1(yum): ge khams rang bzhin spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis rang banin spyod pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song ba'i sa
10a2(yum): kyangs rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bla med pa rlung
10a3(yum): gi khams chos thams cad spong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid byed dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
10a4(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung
10a5(yum): khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba zhes bya ba med la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid song ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong brjid kyis snang
10a6(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par rlung gi khams mas
10a7(yum): bzhes du byeng med babyud du/ 'bregs pa'i tshul gyis med de zhus 'azung bsrid kyang mings la/ yong sa kyis kya rnam nas kyi byung //
10a8(yum): rab kyi chol tu phyin pa la spyong ba mis rnam pathams cad mkhyen cing dang ldan pa'i ming 'byed med par/ rlung gi khams das mo grang ba/
10b1(yum): byabyung mapar byed// dmigs pa'i rdul gyis dngas pa med pa song banyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom snyamasas byed do// gapar ba
10b2(yum): tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
10b3(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
10b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/
10b5(yum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
10b6(yum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ro// nam mkha'i mkham/
10b7(yum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigos pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs rlom sems su byed do//
10b8(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya
11a1(yum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
11a2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam ma'a'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar smi
11a3(yum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong panyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
11a4(yum): ba la spyod dra'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med brag/ zham mkha'i khams byi nang sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
11a5(yum): dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
11a6(yum): che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
11a7(yum): slong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa rnams cung ma khyen
11a8(yum): da yang pa kyi slong sa bya med kyi gas kyi tshum gyis pa pa
11b1(yum): sa rnams rgyas nga // dgas rab kya ras du phyin du la spyad nam/ rnam pa rnams padus su
11b2(yum): med par/ nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam par spong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ snying po
11b3(yum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
11b4(yum): nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sring po nyid kyis kya
11b5(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin la bya ba med par/ nam ma
11b6(yum): khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rmi//
11b7(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'
11b8(yum): khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
12a1(yum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / rnam rnams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa yang la
12a2(yum): med par/ nam ma pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/
12a3(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
12a4(yum): nam mkha'i khams dor ba med par stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
12a5(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i ma
12a6(yum): rang bzhin stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa'id kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/
12a7(yum): da pa da phyu sbyi pa 'dus bya na / du d+d+he pa /
12a8(yum): byab me kyi ga po ma thams cing slong ba da ci migs pa phreng ngos kyis kyang ma sems su byung // rigs ba
12b1(yum): tuthun pa la spyod pa sa/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i sa bya ba med par/ rnamam pa'i 'am pa rang gim tshun cing sung bzhes zla pa me du 'du
12b2(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pal sbyong
12b3(yum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i
12b4(yum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
12b5(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po med par stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
12b6(yum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
12b7(yum): nAd mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ namu mkha' khams ngo bo nyid spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje
12b8(yum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
13a1(yum): mkhyen pa 'idi dngadu ldan pa'i yid la byu ba med par/ nam ma kha'i khams dngos po med pa 'do 'ad song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/
13a2(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyong dmigastsal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // rab 'byor gnan yang bya/
13a3(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nid dang ldan yid la bya ba med par/
13a4(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rlung stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis rlung stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
13a5(yum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la spyod pa'o/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
13a6(yum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
13a7(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma byu pa spyod dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ rnam pa thams cad shes pa'i mas dra na snang ba sa
13a8(yum): byab ming sa byed pa dmigs pa'i tshul rgyas byin gro banyid kyang chags la/ grang banyid kyis par tshom sems su byed pa// shesas rab kyi ma
13b1(yum): la smra pa m+b+han rlung ba pangs can byud dang na pa'i mdul byu med byur / rnam pa dus skye sa nga nga spyang sgyur chung du
13b2(yum): ba rlom mas sa rji kyang dmigs so// song sa ci kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// shes rab gyi pa rol du phyin pa'i skyed pa'i ma rang
13b3(yum): bad dang ldan pa'i mdul bya ba med byur/ rnam par skyes pa'i khams chen po so zhes rgyu bar med la byed de/ dmigs de kyi la hU~M sa na'i phreng ba
13b4(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang dri ldan pa'i
13b5(yum): la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs nga'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang nga migs pa/
13b6(yum): pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
13b7(yum): la bye ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
13b8(yum): spang pa cing kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rgashes rab kyi pha rol tu phrin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po 'om dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med
14a1(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
14a2(yum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
14a3(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
14a4(yum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
14a5(yum): byin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med
14a6(yum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha mo med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom
14a7(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna
14a8(yum): bar shes pa'i khams dong ba med pa song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kya dmigs la/
14b1(yum): stod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/
14b2(yum): yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
14b3(yum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma
14b4(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
14b5(yum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
14b6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
14b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
14b8(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pastong pa zhe
15a1(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
15a2(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
15a3(yum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po myed pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po meng bgrod ba cid kyang dmigs la/
15a4(yum): brayid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// desasu ba kyi pha rol du dran pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la
15a5(yum): myed ngan/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid slob pa zhes bya ba med la byedad/ dmig smra ba'i tshul gyis ngo nyid stong ba nyid kyang dmigs pa/
15a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i la
15a7(yum): la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid song ba nas bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos bo med nga
15a8(yum): de bo nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor ga/ zhin mong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
15b1(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid dang ldan pa'i yid la du bya med par/ ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes byar rin
15b2(yum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyi mtsho rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi rol du
15b3(yum): phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa'i phyi na ngo spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
15b4(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
15b5(yum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul
15b6(yum): gyis phye nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
15b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa stong kyi spyod pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigasla pa'i tshul gyis
15b8(yum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
16a1(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i dza/
16a2(yum): gyis chen po stong pa 'ad kyang dmigs la/ stong pa med kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha nal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa'
16a3(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med byar/ marig 'din dam pa stong zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngom ngas pa
16a4(yum): ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca ma thun
16a5(yum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
16a6(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
16a7(yum): ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ marig pa 'dus mi byas snong bu zhes bya bar meng la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong po nyid
16a8(yum): dmigs la/ snying pa zhid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de nas rab kyi pha rol du dran pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa'i ma so cang mkhyen pa nyidang dang
16b1(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das /
16b2(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad rnam
16b3(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
16b4(yum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
16b5(yum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
16b6(yum): la gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/
16b7(yum): bya spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
16b8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
17a1(yum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa chos thams/
17a2(yum): cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
17a3(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
17a4(yum): rig par dag mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid lang+ge/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
17a5(yum): kyang chom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mi khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa/
17a6(yum): ma rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song pa nyid
17a7(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rmi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
17a8(yum): mi rig pa dngos po med pa song zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song ba'i
17b1(yum): kyis kyang tshum sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nga dang ldan pa'i yingal bya ba myed
17b2(yum): par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom
17b3(yum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig
17b4(yum): pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
17b5(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum du gsunapa/ bam po'i dra gnyis zla ba//
17b6(yum): rab 'byor gzhan yang she byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
17b7(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmig
17b8(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
18a1(yum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par / 'du byed bye song ba zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid rjes kyang /
18a2(yum): dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
18a3(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
18a4(yum): nga nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dang ldan pa'i yid la byab
18a5(yum): med par 'du byed stong pa nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigase la/ stong pa nyid kyis
18a6(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
18a7(yum): 'du byed chen po stong po zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ sring pa nyid kyis stong rlom sems
18a8(yum): su bying po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed don dam
18b1(yum): song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ de stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de na/
18b2(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas spong pa zhes du
18b3(yum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
18b4(yum): byin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
18b5(yum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
18b6(yum): / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'angs pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
18b7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
18b8(yum): pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tham meng par zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs /
19a1(yum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
19a2(yum): rol tus byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa stod pa zhes bya bar yang
19a3(yum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa spong ba zhes cid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis
19a4(yum): rol tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang banin spong ba nas bya bar med la byed de/
19a5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa'i le/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la
19a6(yum): nga'i chu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chos thams nung po nis bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig sa nga'i tshu
19a7(yum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam
19a8(yum): pathams cad mkhyen pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong de zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
19b1(yum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems sa byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam/
19b2(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med po spong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do// dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis
19b3(yum): dngos po med par stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
19b4(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
19b5(yum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
19b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
19b7(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sdong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b8(yum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa na
20a1(yum): spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
20a2(yum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ rnam par shes pa bye
20a3(yum): bo zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
20a4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa byi na stong pa zhes bya bar yid
20a5(yum): la byed do// dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20a6(yum): la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya ba yi la byed
20a7(yum): dmigo sa nga'i rdul gyis stong pa nyid snang ba nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong de nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
20a8(yum): spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming la bye ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
20b1(yum): 'di tshul pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spyod pa nyid kyis kyang sa rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyo
20b2(yum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dmi pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
20b3(yum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
20b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi gus pa'i tshum
20b5(yum): gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la sbyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
20b6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
20b7(yum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
20b8(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
21a1(yum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kying
21a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes 'thog mi dang tha ma med pa spyong du zhes
21a3(yum): bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med de stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
21a4(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
21a5(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
21a6(yum): du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la med par/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
21a7(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang ngazhin spong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasas byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du stong du'i /
21a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
21b1(yum): rdul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i
21b2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nying spyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs
21b3(yum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodapa
21b4(yum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
21b5(yum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
21b6(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
21b7(yum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
21b8(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang /
22a1(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
22a2(yum): de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po medang
22a3(yum): de bo nyid snyeng pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ song ba'id kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zhes
22a4(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
22a5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
22a6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa cid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs kyi song pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rnal byos phyi song pa nyi byung /
22a7(yum): dmigs pa/ stongang nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de nas rab nga rim tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / rnam 'thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
22a8(yum): la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs byi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
22b1(yum): kyang rnams mas su byed // rnams rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'am/ rnam pa thanas sa mkhyen n+d+ha dung ldan pa'i da la byu med bya drung brdzun
22b2(yum): spong ba nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spong ba nyid kya drang dathugs na
22b3(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
22b4(yum): med par/ ming dang gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang
22b5(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming gzug
22b6(yum): don dab pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye/
22b7(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs 'dus byas song
22b8(yum): pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de na sar
23a1(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa de yid la bya ba med par/ mang /
23a2(yum): dang gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rgya
23a3(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad me byon pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming
23a4(yum): dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
23a5(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
23a6(yum): bya ba med dur/ ming dang gzugs rdzog ma dang tha ma med pa song ba nas bro bar yid mi byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thig ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
23a7(yum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
23a8(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/ maung dang gzugs dor ba med pa song pa zhes bya ba yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis der ba chen
23b1(yum): pa med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyong 'di rnadu
23b2(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ maung dngag zugs rang bzhin stod pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs par rnam
23b3(yum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i rgyu/
23b4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs chos thams cad stong pa'is bya bar yid la byed de/
23b5(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
23b6(yum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
23b7(yum): bye bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/
23b8(yum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs mi
24a1(yum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
24a2(yum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/
24a3(yum): yid la bya ba med par/ mi dang mo gzugs dngos po med pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
24a4(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
24a5(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo zhid stong pa nyid kyang /
24a6(yum): dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa 'i nga/
24a7(yum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
24a8(yum): me pa'i so song bzhid kyang dmigs pa/ song panyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rang 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma
24b1(yum): drang dzin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byung med par ma myed du
24b2(yum): spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong de nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su spyod do// rin
24b3(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang song ba zhes
24b4(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
24b5(yum): tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
24b6(yum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod
24b7(yum): bya ba med par/ skye mched drug slong dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byi nang stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
24b8(yum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
24b9(yum): migs pa'i tshul byas bu ma snang pa 'a kyang dmams
25a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmig
25a2(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chen ba stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/
25a3(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
25a4(yum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
25a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
25a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigasel/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca
25a7(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa 'ide tshul gyis 'dus
25a8(yum): ma byas spong bzhid kying dmigs la/ song ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa jam
25b1(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming la bya bar med par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar sring ma byed de/ dmigs pa'i chub tu
25b2(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sdong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod du'i na
25b3(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thob ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/
25b4(yum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
25b5(yum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigos bI
25b6(yum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa
25b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin/
25b8(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
26a1(yum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba myed la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rna
26a2(yum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
26a3(yum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
26a4(yum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid kyang dmigs la/ sdong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyor pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams
26a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming
26a6(yum): bstod pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
26a7(yum): bkyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa/
26a8(yum): suM klas pa'i nga migs pa/ yang ba'i gyis kyang chub sems da byed pa// deshes rab kyi ril du phyin pa la srung pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
26b1(yum): bcad dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug banyid stong ba zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ro ba nyid stong bami kyang /
26b2(yum): dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
26b3(yum): ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i de
26b4(yum): bo nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes
26b5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
26b6(yum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
26b7(yum): la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phye stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
26b8(yum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
27a1(yum): su na du
27a2(yum): nang slong bad kyang dmigs pa/ sang ba nyid kyis kyi rlom sems su byed de// zhes 'od kyi 'is tu byed pa'il sna 'i pa 'i
27a3(yum): drung ldan pa'i yi la byang med par/ rig pa song brjid sbyang ba zhes bya na med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying ba du spong ba ni kyang dmigs la
27a4(yum): sbyin gyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes rab gyi ba rol tu spyod pa / rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'ang sa bya ba med papa/ reg pa ma 'i
27a5(yum): srung ba zhes bya bar ming la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis srid chen po seM ba tsud kyang dmigs la// slong ba nyid kyi kyang rlom sems su byed do// desas rabats+tsha
27a6(yum): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg bden dam par spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
27a7(yum): pa'i tshul gyis de mngam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par
27a8(yum): bang ma khyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ reg pa 'dus rgyas zeng pazhes byab me la byed / dmigs par rjes gyis 'dus byas song shi nga /
27a9(yum): dam pa mdza med pa
27a10(yum): byar me pa
27b1(yum): sa pa/ sa gyis pa masams su bye // ga ba pa sa sun pa lagyung bza rnam
27b2(yum): yid la byub par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas song ba ning dmigs la/ song ba srid kyi
27b3(yum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa man/
27b4(yum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
27b5(yum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste dri
27b6(yum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
27b7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dor ba med pa stong po zhes bya bar
27b8(yum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
28a1(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
28a2(yum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal
28a3(yum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chos thams cad spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigaso pa'i tshul
28a4(yum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa rjid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
28a5(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid
28a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab N+DI pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma
28a7(yum): slong stan pa yang su byu papa/ reg meng dang rjes srom sred pa nas smra bur myed la zu sa dam stsu bu'i rnas gyis pa mams pa 'i sa/
28a8(yum): kya da migs pa/ 'ang ba'ad kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de nas rab kyi pha rol du tshun pa la myong badzitsho/ rnam parnams cad sa kyin
28b1(yum): drang ba rgyul byu med nga/ reg pa ngas pa mdapas nas bya bar tshang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rnas gyis dngas padung ba stsu /
28b2(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
28b3(yum): la bya ba med par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
28b4(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa
28b5(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
28b6(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
28b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dam
28b8(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
29a1(yum): med par tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
29a2(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pade/ tsher po
29a3(yum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi rang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spyod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab//
29a4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmigs pa
29a5(yum): tshul gyis song ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa
29a6(yum): yid dang ldan pa'i ya la bya ba med par/ sbyor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po srid pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ sring pa zhid kyi
29a7(yum): mas med de// dgas na gyis spyong phyi/ rnam pa rgyas nga na spyod spyan pa ni me sa byu me / ra 'a sa
29a8(yum): pa'is bya bar yi la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don rnam pa spong bcid kyang dmigs la/ gang ba'id kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// theshes rab kyi/
29b1(yum): la du phyin pa laspyad nga/ na ba mas kya ba sbyin pa pa dang ldan pa'i tshangs bya ba me pa/ ra bu dus dus srung pa zhes bya bar nga byed de/ gas
29b2(yum): rgyas 'dus byas stong panyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skyed pa la sbyor ba'i tshe/ rnam brangams
29b3(yum): bakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la bye ba med par/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas spong ba zhi kya
29b4(yum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
29b5(yum): med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi/
29b6(yum): kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma
29b7(yum): dang tha ma med pa sdong po zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang sa rlom sem
29b8(yum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa song pa
30a1(yum): zhes bya bar yi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med par stong pa nyid byung dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis cung rlom sems su byed
30a2(yum): deshes rab kyi pha rol tus byin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor bar de bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
30a3(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
30a4(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor 'a chos thams cad spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi so chos thams cad
30a5(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ snying pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
30a6(yum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
30a7(yum): kyang dmigs pa la/ stong pa rjid kyis kyang rlob sem sems su byed do// de shes rab kyo pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
30a8(yum): dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs paspong ba zhes bya bar me la byed de// ritshogs pa'i tshul gyis pa ri migs pa spong ba'i kya
30b1(yum): dmigasal/ sadu banyid kyis kyang chum sems su byed do// deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snad pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams ca pa byen pa nyid dngas du pa
30b2(yum): la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song ba
30b3(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba'o//
30b4(yum): bo nyidi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo mo sems su byed do// de
30b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pa zhes
30b6(yum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab
30b7(yum): 'byor gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sres rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
30b8(yum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
31a1(yum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i med la/
31a2(yum): bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
31a3(yum): khyod de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sreng po phyi nang sring pa zhes
31a4(yum): bair yid la byed do// dmigs pa tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
31a5(yum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chul skye
31a6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
31a7(yum): dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ sred pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bor med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnyen po stong pa zed kyang dmigs pa/ sring pa
31a8(yum): kyis kying chum sems sa byeng // degs rab kyi la ma khyen pol myong ba'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad ma phyin pa dang ldan pa'i mingal byang med par/ srings
31b1(yum): nga sa smra gyu/ migs pa kyis ngas pa du nga mags pa/ ngas sa
31b2(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sbed pa 'dus byas stong ba zhes bya bar yid la rnyed/
31b3(yum): de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
31b4(yum): pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas sdong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
31b5(yum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
31b6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
31b7(yum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// do zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
31b8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa thog ma dang tha med pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ ngomigs de'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tham med
32a1(yum): bstod pa nyid kyang dmagasul/ song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
32a2(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dror po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
32a3(yum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
32a4(yum): med par/ sred pa rang bzhin pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sbyim/
32a5(yum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga bya ba med par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong pa/
32a6(yum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi gos pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad spong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
32a7(yum): paral du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ngas bya ba med par/ sred par dag mtshan da srong pa nas bya bar me la byed /
32a8(yum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang sa mtshan meng sring panyid kyang mig pa la/ sring pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// dashes rab kyi pa la du byin pa la sbyor pa
